main.description: Official OpenHIM website - Health Information Mediator for interoperability

ProductOverview.Summary: OpenHIM (Open Health Information Mediator) is an open-source health information exchange platform that enables interoperability between different health information systems.
ProductOverview.Description: OpenHIM provides a central hub for routing, transforming, and orchestrating health data exchanges between various systems. It supports multiple messaging standards including HL7 v2, HL7 v3, and FHIR, making it a key component for building interoperable health information exchanges.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Health information mediator for system interoperability and data exchange
ProductOverview.Users: Health IT architects, system integrators, and health information exchange implementers

Reach.SummaryOfReach: OpenHIM has been implemented in several countries to support national health information exchanges and regional health system interoperability initiatives.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: OpenHIM is developed and maintained by Jembi Health Systems with support from the global health interoperability community.

Sustainability.Description: OpenHIM is supported through open source development and community contributions.
